name: @blackbaud/skyux-visual
description: Provides a Node.js library for running e2e visual tests

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.json && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && rimraf dist && tsc --project tsconfig-test.json && istanbul cover --report=html --report=json --report=text-summary -x **/*.spec.js -x **/fixtures/*.js ./node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=jasmine.json && npm run remap

author: Blackbaud, Inc.
